name: Friend to Foe
description:
A short point and click adventure game about Crawl and why its core loop is so fun.

Made for Assignment 2 of Video Games: Remaking Reality.

Music by Bsharp. 

Thanks to Dave Lloyd of Powerhoof for agreeing to do an interview.

Made with PowerQuest.

Sometimes the Theatre room video is scaled wrong on windows, and does not appear on the web version. If that happens, the link to the trailer is here:
